name: Bicolor (itch)
description:
Our entry for the GMTK Jam 2021 !

We didn't have much time to work on it. The game is a little bit short, but we are happy to have a functional game with a nice concept.

We are beginner in game development. Our main objective during this jam was to familiarize ourselves with the light and particles tools of Unity.

Theme "Joined together": Our interpretation of the theme lies in the mix of colors. The player can interact with the platform that are the same colors as him. And blending in another color change its own color.
